transcript:
Customer: Hello

Hello

Hello. Haan ji.

Han ji, Naseem ji baat kar rahe hain?

Ji.

Naseem ji, good afternoon. Main Priti Rathore baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se. Kaise ho aap?

Bahut badhiya ji, badhiya.

Achha, sir actually maine call kiya tha, aapka discussion chal raha hai kaafi lambe time se. Sabke saath hi baat ho gayi hai, Khushi ke saath, Alok ke saath mein, abhi jo hai umang ke saath mein bhi hui hai. To sir unhone saara kuch clarification to de diya hai aur multiple video meetings ho chuki hai. To isme kuch pending reh gaya hai abhi tak?

Wo to roz hoti rehti hai, usse koi matlab nahi hai humko.

Kya bol rahe hain?

Main keh raha hu wo to roz hoti hai, jaise ki hum [inaudible] karaate hain na, jab wo video meeting bhi jaate hain.

Sir to video meeting to aap waise bhi regular touch mein to rehte hi hain na Khushi ke, to phir problem kaha par hai?

Nahi problem lead hi nahi aa rahi. Jab se baat, jab se lead hi nahi aa rahi, ek ek hafta ho gaya.

Sir teen mahine aapka jo service shuru hua hai, wo teen mahine mein 712 inquiry aur lead aayi hai sir aur kitna expect karoge aap IndiaMART ke platform se? 712 customer bahut bada customer base hota hai sir.

To rahi baat mere ko unhone bataya tha ki aapka ₹1 lakh ka abhi tak order aaya hai IndiaMART ke upar, hai na? To ₹1 lakh ka order jo aaya hai to services to aapki abhi shuru hui hai to ₹1 lakh to justified hai, abhi to aapka agle saal tak pura service valid hai August tak. To itna jaldi agar aap panic karoge to us tarike se business plan nahi kiya jaata sir ki humne do mahine chalaaya then we are asking for refund of services.

Nahi koi tension nahi hai. Suniye meri baat, panic ki koi tension nahi hai. Mere ko to aap Khushi daal dijiye, koi issue nahi hai. Mere aapko call bhi nahi karna, mere jaise aayega waise chalta rahega.

Sir dekho, main aapko ek baat batati hu ki aapka pehle Maxi chalta tha. Maxi mein you were not satisfied, aapne phir usko Star karaya. Abhi Star mein again you were not satisfied. To buyer to nahi badlega. Aapko opportunity zyada milti hai Star mein. Star mein aapka visibility jo hai wo upar aati hai aur marble industry hai sir. Marble industry mein aapko bhi pata hai ki kitna zyada customer hai. Makrana location ka hai, aapka Rajasthan ka pura customer wahi ka hai. To itna zyada agar aap soche, haan ji haan ji.

Suniye meri baat, meri baat suniye.

Ji ji boliye.

Jab main TrustSeal pe ek customer aapko ₹65,000 deke ek customer pakadta hu aur main ₹2,06,000 aapko deke ₹1 lakh ka customer pakad raha hu to mere kya matlab hai? Main to 65 pe jaunga na.

To ye aap comparison tab karoge na jab pura aapka Star ka journey complete ho jayega. Abhi to pura pura saal bacha hua hai sir.

Saal nahi bacha hua hai. Abhi hai na mere ₹45,000 gaye.

Nahi 10 mahine abhi aapke pure bache hue hain na August pura chalu August tak.

Suniye meri baat. Suniye to sahi aap baat nahi samajh pa rahe ho. Aapko kya hai ganit lagana nahi aata hai. Aap padhi likhi seat pe baithe hoge lekin ganit lagana nahi aata hai.

Ab ₹1 lakh ka maine kaam liya, usme kitna munafa banoge aap?

Sir aap munafa, munafa aap kuch bhi laga sakte hain. Do time, two time laga sakte hain, three time laga sakte hain. Wo ab aapki baat alag hai ki aap usko 15% laga le ya 25% laga le, jitna bhi lagana chahe.

30% maan lete hain. 30% maan lete hain. 30%?

25%?

30, 30.

30%?

Han, 30. High level bata raha hu main aapko.

₹30,000 laga liya. Haan haan.

Ab ₹1 lakh mein ₹30,000 mere munafa bacha.

Hmm.

Thik hai? Kitne mahine hue? Abhi teen mahine ka hisab pakdo aap.

Han.

Teen mahine ke andar maine do customer in bande ko bitha rakha hai aur mera to aap chhod hi do. Ab ₹15-15,000 inki salary. Saath aur ₹2,000 mahine ka internet ja raha hai mera ye.

Hmm.

Ab ₹6,000 ye ho gaye aur 15 ti 45. ₹30,000 se kitna ho gaya teen mahine ka ₹90,000.
Hmm.

Kitna hua? Main to ulta loss mein ja raha hu na.

To sir ye jo aapke agar other expenses hain ki ye mere yaha pe ja rahe hain, wo to business hai sir. Business mein electricity ka bhi jayega aapka, bahar baitha agar koi security guard hai uska bhi jayega sir. Aap IndiaMART ka compare karo na.

IndiaMART dekhna compare karna hai mere ko.

IndiaMART pe jo paisa lagaoge wo saal dekho Naseem sir aapke jab hamari meeting hui thi to humne ye bhi IndiaMART pe hi kar raha hu na main. IndiaMART pe hi kar raha hu teen mahine ka hisab bata raha hu main aapko.

Sir aap mujhe bol rahe ho ki mera employee yaha par aapne mujhe bola ki mera employee yaha par baitha hua hai, employee ka mera itna ja raha hai, internet ka mera itna ja raha hai. To sir wo saari cheeze aap usme ROI mein nahi jod sakte hain na ki mera IndiaMART ka ROI itna lagaaya.

Ye ye dekhiye maine laptop kharida, kiske liye kharida IndiaMART pe kaam karne ke liye. Mera laptop.

Wo to permanent aapke paas hi to rahega sir. Aisa to nahi hai ki IndiaMART band ho jayega laptop chala jayega.

Suniye meri baat, maine do bande bithaye abhi IndiaMART pe aap ho. Agar aap unko kama ke nahi doge to aapko kaun rakhega ye bataiye aap.

Sir mujhe ek baat batao, aapne jab hamare saath deal ki thi, aap saamne se hume approach kar rahe the ki mere ko itne mein karke do, nahi itne mein karke do, itne mein karke do. Aapne aapne saamne se approach kiya tha. Humne aapko ye bola tha ki nahi aapko do mahine mein aa jayega, ek mahine mein aa jayega, nahi hoga to hum aapka mein convert kar denge. To aisa nahi hota sir. Hum is tarike mein koi contract to nahi kar sakte sir.

Suniye, suniye meri baat. Main aapko ye to nahi bol raha hu aapne ye ₹1 lakh ka business dilaya, ye dilaya, ye to bol hi nahi raha hu main.

Han han.

Main to wo to nahi bol raha hu.

Nahi to main aapko convert nahi kar paungi sir. Wo aapko agar Sonal mam se baat karni hai aap bilkul karo but main usse convert nahi kar paungi sir abhi.

Nahi convert karna padega aapko. Nahi to main pehle hi convert. Aap ek baar unse baat kar lijiye bilkul kyunki hamara aisa nahi hai to aapko koi communication nahi dega.

Sir wo nahi ho aap aapka call hai. Sir aapka call hai but maine aapko bata diya kyunki na to deal karte hue aisa hamara koi discussion hua hai aur service abhi shuru hui hai to itna jaldi aisa kuch nahi hota aap unko conclude karo.

Kyun nahi hoga main? Kyun nahi hoga? Paisa de diya.

Sir aapne ye bola tha kya ki mere ko do mahine bhi wo nahi aayega to main isme ye kara lunga, convert kara lunga. Ye sab discussion nahi hua na sir hamara?

Nahi hua hai, bilkul hua hai. Ye discussion hua hai ki aapko business nahi milega to aap convert karwa sakte ho. Lekin koi karodo ka thodi utha liya maine business. Mere nuksan lag raha hai, aap keh rahe ho jabardasti chalo, ye koi baat thodi hoti hai. Abhi aap 50,000 salary hai main aapko 15,000 du to kaise chalega?

Ye bataiye.

Ye koi baatein thodi hoti hai main.

Hello.

Hello.

Hello.

Hello.

Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough leads.

- Wants to convert to a different plan.

- Claims to be at a loss with current plan.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the benefits of current plan.

- Executive refused to convert the plan.

- Suggested to talk to Sonal for plan conversion.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will talk to Sonal for conversion.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, refund, plan conversion
